LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.SliderWarning: Sliders are dependent on the values of the qualities above and below, try moving those if you can't move one.
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillPo: Minimum Skill for at least Poor Item Quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillNo: Minimum Skill for at least Normal Item Quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillGo: Minimum Skill for at least Good Item Quality:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillEx: Minimum Skill for at least Excellent Item Quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillMa: Minimum Skill for at least Masterwork Item Quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
LanguageData.CraftingQualityRebalanced.MinimumSkillLe: Minimum Skill for Legendary Item Quality, set above 20 to deactivate:
